item.description:
Following up on recent Boston Meetup, we will explore Boston evening city lights further, with new vantage points and guidance and tech support from Steve Dunwell, an expert on Boston photography, and renowned pro. Check out his book "Extraordinary Boston" or online at www.stevedunwell.com.
Date: Thurs, April 1. Time: 6:15 PM -8:15 PM
meetup location, corner of new Moakley Federal Court House nearest the old bridge. 1 Courthouse Way, Boston.
Fee is $30. Tripod required. We need good weather for this. If thursday weather is not suitable, we will postpone to the following week.
Minimum 5; maximum 12
item.name: Boston Skyline Workshop
